NK073(pu)004:1347: skal gyi dbang gis bye brag tu phye bar zad
NK073(pu)004:1348: do // las kyi bag chags 'di gnyis kyang /
NK073(pu)004:1349: bag chags tsam du 'drar zin kyang /
NK073(pu)004:1350: bslu mi bslu dang brtan mi brtan 'dra bas /
NK073(pu)004:1351: kun rdzob tu bden mi bden gyi bye brag yod pa yin la /
NK073(pu)004:1352: shin tu sbyangs pa'i bag chags kyang /
NK073(pu)004:1353: gang zag thams cad kyi rgyud la yod par grub pa yin no //
NK073(pu)004:1354: 'on kyang dag par mi snang ba ni mthu che chung gi dbang yin te /
NK073(pu)004:1355: rang bzhin khams sna tshogs par grub pa'o //
NK073(pu)004:1357: thun mong gi las dang dngos grub dag mi mthun yang /
NK073(pu)004:1358: mchog gi dngos grub bla na med pa'i byang chub mtshungs pas gud du ma smos so //
NK073(pu)004:1359: gnyis ka rgyud kyi skabs su /
NK073(pu)004:1360: de nyid rnam pa bzhi dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba ni /
NK073(pu)004:1361: gnyis ka rgyud du grags pa'i gzhung kha cig las /
NK073(pu)004:1362: dral ba'i phyag rgyas dam tshig sems dpa'i lus dral te /
NK073(pu)004:1363: ye shes sems dpa' bstims nas /
NK073(pu)004:1364: gnyis su med pa'i skur bsgom pa gtsor gsungs pa yod pas /
NK073(pu)004:1365: de'i dbang gis de nyid rnam pa bzhir 'gyur te /
NK073(pu)004:1366: 'dir lta lha'i sku la bdag dang lha gnyis /
NK073(pu)004:1367: de gnyis su med pa'i thugs ka na gnas pa'i yig 'bru dang gsum /
NK073(pu)004:1368: de dag gi bzlas brjod dang bzhir 'gyur ro //
NK073(pu)004:1369: kri ya'i skabs su ni lha drug lhar gud du phye bas de nyid gsum du bshad do //
NK073(pu)004:1370: rnal 'byor phyi pa thub pa rgyud ces bya ba la /
NK073(pu)004:1371: phyi pa ni mdor bsdu na lta spyod gnyis kyi sgo nas phyir gzhag ste /
NK073(pu)004:1372: de la lta bas kun rdzob tu bdag dang sangs rgyas mnyam par mi lta ba dang /
NK073(pu)004:1373: spyod pas mnyam pa'i brtul zhugs dang du mi len pa'o //
NK073(pu)004:1374: thub pa ni bsrung du med pa'i dam tshig nyams su len mi nus te /
NK073(pu)004:1375: thun mong gi sdom pa rnams dang mi bral ba'o //
NK073(pu)004:1376: nang pa thabs kyi rgyud ces bya ba ni /
NK073(pu)004:1377: de las ldog pa nyid yin te /
NK073(pu)004:1378: bdag nyid ma nor ba'i dbang phyug chen por lta ba dang /
NK073(pu)004:1379: mnyam pa'i brtul zhugs dang du len pa dang /
NK073(pu)004:1380: sgo gsum gyi spyod pa la bkag pa med kyang skyon gyis mi gos pas na thabs mkhas pa'o //
NK073(pu)004:1381: de la don dam par skye 'gag med pa'i lha dang lha mo dang zhes bya ba ni /
NK073(pu)004:1382: de'i rang bzhin dang byin rlabs zhes tshig rnam par sbyar te /
NK073(pu)004:1383: de la lha 'di ni lhar btags pa zhe'am /
NK073(pu)004:1384: lha'i ngo bo zhes grags pa ste /
NK073(pu)004:1385: 'di ltar don dam pa'i lha dang /
NK073(pu)004:1386: sems dpa'i bye brag gi lha zhes grags pa las /
NK073(pu)004:1387: de'i char gtogs pa yongs su dag pa'i lhar grags pa la gzung ngo //
NK073(pu)004:1388: de dang 'dra ba'i rgyud yongs su chos nyid /
NK073(pu)004:1389: dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis de las gzhan pa /
NK073(pu)004:1390: kun rdzob tu 'phags pa'i gzugs kyi sku /
NK073(pu)004:1391: phyag rgya bzhi dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor sgom zhes bya ba ni /
NK073(pu)004:1392: dam tshig can gyi skye bos brtags pa'i lhar gzung ste /
NK073(pu)004:1393: de las kyang phal cher 'dir mngon par byang chub pa rnam pa lnga dang /
NK073(pu)004:1394: cho 'phrul chen po bzhi'i sgo nas lhar bskyed cing bsgoms pas /
NK073(pu)004:1395: ji skad du grags pa'i phyag rgya bzhi'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa gtsor gzung ngo //
NK073(pu)004:1396: de la phyag rgya bzhi ni /
NK073(pu)004:1397: bdag nyid chen po rnams kyi sku gsung thugs kyi mdzad pa dang bcas pa'i mtshan ma ste /
NK073(pu)004:1398: de la dam tshig ni thugs gsang ba'i ye shes /
NK073(pu)004:1399: phyag rgya ni de'i mtshan ma rnams te /
NK073(pu)004:1400: de bas na dam tshig gi phyag rgya zhes bya'o //
NK073(pu)004:1401: 'di ni phan tshun tha dad par sbyar ba ste /
NK073(pu)004:1402: lha sbyin gyi ril pa spyi blugs bzhin no //
NK073(pu)004:1403: yang phyag rgya 'di lha mi 'da' ba'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pas de skad ces bya'o //
NK073(pu)004:1404: 'di ni chos dang chos can du sbyar ba ste /
NK073(pu)004:1405: mar gyi bum pa bzhin no //
NK073(pu)004:1406: yang na 'di nyid 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pas de skad ces bya'o //
NK073(pu)004:1407: 'di ni bdag nyid gcig par sbyar ba ste /
NK073(pu)004:1409: chos ni phan pa dang bden pa ston pa'i rgyal ba'i mtshan nyid do //
NK073(pu)004:1410: las ni rgyal ba rnams kyi 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'i las kyi mtshan nyid do //
NK073(pu)004:1411: de dag gi phyag rgya'i tshul bshad pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
NK073(pu)004:1412: phyag rgya chen po ni sku'i mtshan ma ste /
NK073(pu)004:1413: lha dran pa'i rgyur che ba'i phyir chen po zhes bshad /
NK073(pu)004:1414: kha cig las phyag rgya rnams kyi gzhir gyur pas chen po zhes kyang bshad do //
NK073(pu)004:1416: bskyed rdzogs rnam pa gsum gyi tshul gsum du gzhag pa ni /
NK073(pu)004:1418: lha'i dkyil 'khor gcig bsgom pa'i tshul la'ang /
NK073(pu)004:1419: rnal 'byor pa shes rab dang ting nge 'dzin gyi
NK073(pu)004:1420: stobs che chung gi bye brag gis tshul gsum du
NK073(pu)004:1422: gzhung so so la yang tshul gsum gyi shas che
NK073(pu)004:1423: chung gi bye brag yod do zhes kyang grags so
NK073(pu)004:1424: // de la ting nge 'dzin rnams pa gsum rim gyis bskyed cing zhes bya ba ni /
NK073(pu)004:1425: tshul 'di la gnas pa rnams bskyed na lhar lta /
NK073(pu)004:1426: ma bskyed na mi lta ba ma yin te /
NK073(pu)004:1427: rgyu dang 'bras bu dbyer med par /
NK073(pu)004:1428: lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor du lta mod kyi /
NK073(pu)004:1429: ting nge 'dzin gyi rtsa la sbyang ba la /
NK073(pu)004:1430: rim gyis sbyang bar bya ba tsam du zad do //
NK073(pu)004:1432: rnal 'byor chen po'i lta ba la /
NK073(pu)004:1433: chos thams cad lhun gyis grub pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor du sangs rgyas par lta ba la /
NK073(pu)004:1434: sangs rgyas kyi bye brag gsum du smra ste /
NK073(pu)004:1438: de la rang bzhin sangs rgyas ni /
NK073(pu)004:1440: de yang gnas skabs gsum du smra ste /
NK073(pu)004:1444: de la rang bzhin sangs rgyas ni /
NK073(pu)004:1446: de yang gnas skabs gsum du smra ste /
NK073(pu)004:1447: skye ba rgyu'i sangs rgyas dang /
NK073(pu)004:1448: skye ba rten pa'i sangs rgyas dang /
NK073(pu)004:1449: skye ba mngon par grub pa'i sangs rgyas so //
NK073(pu)004:1450: de la skye ba rgyu'i sangs rgyas ni /
NK073(pu)004:1451: sems can gyi lus 'grub pa'i rgyu /
NK073(pu)004:1452: pha ma gnyis kyi sa bon rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis bzung ba'i dus na /
NK073(pu)004:1453: nyon mongs pa dang phung po dang skye mched thams
NK073(pu)004:1454: cad kyi sa bon dang khams kyi rang bzhin du
NK073(pu)004:1456: de nyid yongs su rdzogs pa'i lha'i dkyil 'khor du sangs rgyas par lta'o //
NK073(pu)004:1457: skye ba rten pa'i sangs rgyas ni /
NK073(pu)004:1458: pha ma gnyis kyi lus dang sems kyi khams thams cad lha'i dkyil 'khor du grub par lta'o //
NK073(pu)004:1459: skye ba mngon par grub pa'i sangs rgyas ni /
NK073(pu)004:1460: rang gi lus mngon par grub pa 'di nyid /
NK073(pu)004:1461: de lta bu'i tshul du lta ba'o //
NK073(pu)004:1462: rtogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni de ltar rtogs pa'i rig 'dzin gyi sa la gnas pa rnams so //
NK073(pu)004:1463: grub pa'i sangs rgyas ni de nyid mngon du gyur pa'o //
NK073(pu)004:1464: 'di rnams kyang rang bzhin dang gnas skabs kyi bye brag tu 'dod do //
NK073(pu)004:1465: 'di lta bu la sogs pa'i tshul gyis sangs ma rgyas pa'i chos mi 'dod kyang /
NK073(pu)004:1466: ma rtogs pa rtogs par bya ba dang /
NK073(pu)004:1467: ma goms pa goms par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi sa gsum la blo sbyang bar 'dod de /
NK073(pu)004:1468: de yang kun tu 'od kyi sa la blo sbyang bar bya ba'i phyir /
NK073(pu)004:1469: de bzhin nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin rnam par mi rtog pa bsgom pa dang /
NK073(pu)004:1470: pad+ma can gyi sa la goms par bya ba'i phyir /
NK073(pu)004:1471: kun tu snang gi ting nge 'dzin shes rab dang snying rje 'brel bar bsgom pa dang /
NK073(pu)004:1472: yi ge 'khor lo tshogs chen gyi sa la goms par bya ba'i phyir /
NK073(pu)004:1473: rgyu'i ting nge 'dzin yig 'bru bsgom pa nas /
NK073(pu)004:1474: dkyil 'khor rim gyis bskyed cing goms par byed pa'i tshul lo //
NK073(pu)004:1476: don dam par skye 'gag med pa'i lha dang lha mo dang /
NK073(pu)004:1477: rnam par mi rtog pa'i don dbu ma chos kyi dbyings las kyang ma g.yos la /
NK073(pu)004:1478: kun rdzob tu 'phags pa'i gzugs kyi sku yang gsal bar bsgom zhing /
NK073(pu)004:1479: mnyam la ma 'dres par bsgoms pas 'grub ces pa ni /
NK073(pu)004:1480: 'dir rnal 'byor rgyud kyi gzhung las grags pa'i bsgom
NK073(pu)004:1481: zhing nyams su blang bar bya ba'i don thams cad
NK073(pu)004:1482: byang chub kyi sems rang bzhin rig pa skad cig
NK073(pu)004:1483: ma gcig la rdzogs par gsal bar sgom nus pa'i
NK073(pu)004:1486: chos nyid rnam par mi rtog pa dang /
NK073(pu)004:1487: sgyu ma lha'i dkyil 'khor bsgom pa'ang /
NK073(pu)004:1488: gzhan yang lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor dang /
NK073(pu)004:1489: lhag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor ram /
NK073(pu)004:1492: gzugs brnyan gyis dkyil 'khor lta bu /
NK073(pu)004:1493: dgongs don so sor gsungs pa thams cad dus gcig tu gsal bar rdzogs zhes pa'i don ste /
NK073(pu)004:1494: dper na rdzu 'phrul can gyis spyod lam rnam bzhi
NK073(pu)004:1495: dus gcig tu ston pa la 'gal ba med pa
NK073(pu)004:1496: lta bu'o // de yang mdor bsdu na /
NK073(pu)004:1497: gnyis las ma g.yos bzhin du ni gcig tu gsal /
NK073(pu)004:1498: gcig tu dbyer med pa bzhin du ni gsum du ma 'dres /
NK073(pu)004:1499: 'di ltar rig pa skad cig ma la rdzogs pa ni /
NK073(pu)004:1500: rdzogs pa'i tshul zhes bya ste /
NK073(pu)004:1501: de la gnyis las ma g.yos pa ni /
NK073(pu)004:1502: don dam par skye 'gag med pa'i rang bzhin du
NK073(pu)004:1503: lhun gyis grub pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor du
NK073(pu)004:1504: / snang srid thams cad lhun gyis grub par sangs
NK073(pu)004:1505: rgyas pa'i dgongs don las ma g.yos pa dang gcig
NK073(pu)004:1506: / / don dam rnam par mi rtog pa dbu
NK073(pu)004:1507: ma chos kyi dbyings su rtogs pa'i dgongs pa las
NK073(pu)004:1508: ma g.yos pa dang gnyis so //
NK073(pu)004:1509: de las ma g.yos bzhin du rang gi phung po dang /
NK073(pu)004:1511: skye mched lhag pa ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor
NK073(pu)004:1512: du gsal bar bsgom pa ni gsal ba gcig ces
NK073(pu)004:1513: bya'o // gcig tu dbyer med pa ni /
NK073(pu)004:1514: cir snang cir bsgoms kyang thams cad chos nyid byang
NK073(pu)004:1515: chub kyi sems skye 'gag med pa'i dbyings su dbyer
NK073(pu)004:1518: thams cad lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor du bsgom pa yang /
NK073(pu)004:1519: ting nge 'dzin gzhan dang ma 'dres pa dang /
NK073(pu)004:1520: lhag pa ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor du sku
NK073(pu)004:1521: mdog dang phyag mtshan la sogs pa gsal ba yang
NK073(pu)004:1523: gtso gzungs 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa so
NK073(pu)004:1524: sor gsal ba ni ma 'dres pa gsum zhes bya'o
NK073(pu)004:1525: // 'di lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin yang rtsol ba med par lhun gyis grub pa sbyor nus shing /
NK073(pu)004:1526: phyogs dus mnyam pa nyid du sbyor nus na ni /
NK073(pu)004:1527: rdzogs pa chen po'i tshul nyid dang yang khyad par med par 'gyur ba las /
NK073(pu)004:1528: 'dir de ltar cung zad ma nus te /
NK073(pu)004:1529: sbyor ba rtsol ba dang bcas pa dang /
NK073(pu)004:1530: rig pa phyogs su sbyor ba dang /
NK073(pu)004:1531: skad cig ma dus su sbyor bas bye brag tu byas pa yin te /
NK073(pu)004:1532: de yang 'di ltar rig pa skad cig ma gcig la /
NK073(pu)004:1533: don thams cad 'di ltar rdzogs par sbyar ro zhes 'dod do //
NK073(pu)004:1536: spyi'i khyad par dang 'bras bu'i lta ba ni ma gsungs kyi /
NK073(pu)004:1537: lam bsgom pa 'ba' zhig tsam zhig gsungs te /
NK073(pu)004:1538: 'di'i dgongs pa yang gong du bstan pa bzhin du /
NK073(pu)004:1539: don dam par skye 'gag med pa dang /
NK073(pu)004:1540: kun rdzob sgyu ma yongs su dag pa'i lha'i dkyil 'khor du lta ba dang /
NK073(pu)004:1541: bden pa rnam gnyis kyang dbyer med par lta ba dang /
NK073(pu)004:1542: 'bras bu bla na med pa'i byang chub la theg pa chen po thams cad khyad par med pas /
NK073(pu)004:1543: dbye mi dgos so zhes dgongs pa'o //
NK073(pu)004:1544: 'on kyang sngon gyi slob dpon rnams kyis tshul phra mo'i sgo nas dbye ba mdzad pa ni /
NK073(pu)004:1545: pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa spyi'i tshul chos nyid sangs rgyas su lta /
NK073(pu)004:1546: chos can mtshan ma rang ka ma ji ltar snang snang tsam du lta /
NK073(pu)004:1547: nges pa don gyi mdo sde dang gsang sngags kyi tshul ni /
NK073(pu)004:1548: bden pa gnyis dbyer med par lta zhing /
NK073(pu)004:1549: phung po lnga yang sangs rgyas su lta /
NK073(pu)004:1552: mtshan ma rang ka ma'i chos dang /
NK073(pu)004:1553: byin gyis brlabs pa'i lha dang /
NK073(pu)004:1554: rnam par sprul pa'i lha rnams kyang /
NK073(pu)004:1555: chos nyid dag pa'i lha las mi gzhan pas /
NK073(pu)004:1556: chos nyid dag pa'i lhar lta'o zhes 'chad do //
NK073(pu)004:1559: byin gyis brlabs pa'i tshul gnyis ka nas lhar lta'o zhes 'chad do //
NK073(pu)004:1563: lhun gyis grub pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gsum car nas lhar lta'o zhes bcad do //
NK073(pu)004:1564: nang pa'i bskyed rdzogs gsum gyi tshul las kyang /
NK073(pu)004:1565: bskyed pa'i tshul ma h+aa yo ga pa ni /
NK073(pu)004:1566: 'jig rten 'di dag skye ba rgyu'i sangs rgyas dang /
NK073(pu)004:1567: skye ba rten pa'i sangs rgyas dang /
NK073(pu)004:1568: skye ba mngon par grub pa'i sangs rgyas rnam pa gsum gyi tshul nas /
NK073(pu)004:1569: rang bzhin gyi sangs rgyas su lta'o zhes 'chad do //
NK073(pu)004:1571: rang gi rig pa byang chub kyi sems nyid las gzhan pa'i chos med la /
NK073(pu)004:1572: de nyid sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid chen por sangs rgyas par lta bas lhar lta'o //
NK073(pu)004:1574: rdzogs pa chen po'i tshul ni /
NK073(pu)004:1575: man ngag gi yi ge 'di'i brtsam pa'i gzhi nyid yin pa'i phyir /
NK073(pu)004:1576: don gtan la phab nas rgyas par gsungs la /
NK073(pu)004:1577: lta ba gzhan thams cad ni 'di'i gol sgrib dang
NK073(pu)004:1578: mu stegs tsam yin pa'i phyir phyogs tsam gsungs so
NK073(pu)004:1579: // de la 'dir brtsam pa'i gzhi rdzogs pa chen po'i lta ba'i don gtan la phab ste /
NK073(pu)004:1580: ma 'ongs pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis nyams su blang du rung bar bstan pa'i phyir /
NK073(pu)004:1581: 'dir rdzogs pa chen po'i lta ba mthar phyin pa'i don bstan pa dang /
NK073(pu)004:1582: de nyams su blangs zhing goms par bya ba'i thabs 'bras bu dang bcas pa bstan pa'i phyir /
NK073(pu)004:1583: rdzogs pa chen po'i tshul bstan pa dang /
NK073(pu)004:1584: de chud mi gzan pa'i phyir rdzogs pa'i don 'di
NK073(pu)004:1585: rnyed par dka' zhing kun gyi thun mong ma yin
NK073(pu)004:1586: pa dang / 'di ston pa'i slob dpon yang don 'di tsam shes pas byar mi rung ste /
NK073(pu)004:1587: sems can gyi snod dang sbyar nas ston zhes pas bya dgos par ston to //
NK073(pu)004:1588: de lta bu'i tshul de dag bstan pa'i phyir /
NK073(pu)004:1589: rdzogs pa chen po'i tshul ni /
NK073(pu)004:1590: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
NK073(pu)004:1591: de la 'dir rdzogs pa chen po'i don dang /
NK073(pu)004:1592: de'i tshul gnyis mdor bstan par dgongs nas /
NK073(pu)004:1593: rdzogs pa chen po'i tshul ni /
NK073(pu)004:1594: 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos thams cad dbyer med par /
NK073(pu)004:1595: sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin /
NK073(pu)004:1596: ye nas yin pa rtogs nas bsgom pa ste /
NK073(pu)004:1598: de la kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos 'khor ba rgyu dang 'bras bur bcas pa thams cad dang /
NK073(pu)004:1599: rnam par byang ba'i chos mya ngan las 'das pa'i
NK073(pu)004:1600: rgyu dang 'bras bur bcas pa thams cad dbyer med
NK073(pu)004:1601: zhes sbyar te / de la dbye ba ni gang /
NK073(pu)004:1602: dbyer med pa ni gang du ji ltar med ce na /
NK073(pu)004:1603: de la dbye ba zhes bya ba ni /
NK073(pu)004:1604: chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid so so'i dbye ba ste /
NK073(pu)004:1606: kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i mtshan nyid dag ni /
NK073(pu)004:1608: spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid dag ni 'di dang 'di dag zhe'am /
NK073(pu)004:1609: nag po dang dkar po'i chos kyi mtshan nyid dag ni /
NK073(pu)004:1610: 'di dang 'di dag go zhes bya ba la sogs pa /
NK073(pu)004:1611: chos kyi rab tu dbye ba ji snyed pa thams cad do //
NK073(pu)004:1612: de dag dbyer gang du med ce na /
NK073(pu)004:1613: sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin du dbyer med ces sbyar te /
NK073(pu)004:1614: dper na 'jig rten phal pa dang /
NK073(pu)004:1615: phyi rol mu stegs can gyis rnam par bzhag pa'i tha snyad kyi mtshan nyid thams cad dang /
NK073(pu)004:1616: gang zag gi mtshan nyid thams cad dang /
NK073(pu)004:1617: sangs rgyas pa rnams kyis chos kyi mtshan nyid du dbyer med par bsdus te bstan pa bzhin no //
NK073(pu)004:1618: ji ltar dbyer med ce na /
NK073(pu)004:1619: de'i rang bzhin ye nas yin pa'i phyir te /
NK073(pu)004:1620: 'di la sgro skur dang rtsol ba dag gis bsnyad pa'i glags mi rnyed pa'i phyir ro //
NK073(pu)004:1621: des ni rdzogs pa chen po'i lta ba'i don mdor bsdus te bstan pa yin no //
NK073(pu)004:1622: de ltar yin par rtogs nas bsgom zhes bya ni /
NK073(pu)004:1625: rtogs pa rnam bzhi'i lam gyis yid ched par bya ba dang /
NK073(pu)004:1626: yid ches pa de la mtshan nyid gsum gyis don mthar phyin par bya ba dang /
NK073(pu)004:1627: mthar phyin par bya ba de nyid la yang /
NK073(pu)004:1628: bsnyen bsgrub rnam pa bzhis rtsol ba med par lhun gyis grub par don la bzla ba dang /
NK073(pu)004:1629: de lta bu lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i thabs bstan pa rnams kyis /
NK073(pu)004:1630: rtogs nas bsgom pa'i tshul la legs par ston par 'gyur ro //
NK073(pu)004:1632: da ni rdzogs pa chen po'i rgyas par bshad par bzhed de /
NK073(pu)004:1633: de yang lung gis yid ches par bya ba'i phyir /
NK073(pu)004:1634: rgyud kyi khungs smos pa'i tshul gyis bshad pa /
NK073(pu)004:1636: rdo rje phung po'i yan lag ni //
NK073(pu)004:1637: zhes bya ba la sogs pa /
NK073(pu)004:1638: rgyud las gsungs pa'i tshig dang slob dpon gyis rnam par sbyar bar mdzad pa dag ste /
NK073(pu)004:1639: de las phal cher ni spyir grags pas ma bshad do //
NK073(pu)004:1640: rdo rje phung po zhes bya ba ni /
NK073(pu)004:1641: gsang sngags kyi grub pa'i mtha' las chos can /
NK073(pu)004:1642: phung po rnams kyang rdo rje phung po /
NK073(pu)004:1643: skye mched rnams kyang rdo rje skye mched du bzhed de dam bca' /
NK073(pu)004:1644: sku gsung thugs rdo rje lta bu'i lha'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro 'thad pa /
NK073(pu)004:1648: de las byung ba'i byang chub kyi sems zhes smos pa la /
NK073(pu)004:1652: zhes sngon gyi slob dpon rnams kyis bshad do //
NK073(pu)004:1653: de las byung ba'i byang chub kyi sems zhes bya ba ni /
NK073(pu)004:1654: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i rjes su skyes pa'i
NK073(pu)004:1655: yid kyi khams la bya zhes yongs grags khams lugs
NK073(pu)004:1656: pa gsungs so // lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
NK073(pu)004:1657: rkyen gyis tshor ba la bya zhes dbus lugs pa
NK073(pu)004:1658: pa gsungs so // gsung ste / de lta na
NK073(pu)004:1659: yang thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med par sbyor
NK073(pu)004:1660: ba'i bde ba myong ba'i byang chub kyi sems yin
NK073(pu)004:1661: pa gsungs so // gsung ste / no zhes 'chad / yongs ni 'di lus kyi dbang po dang /
NK073(pu)004:1663: rnam par shes pa gsum 'phrad pa las skyes pa'i /
NK073(pu)004:1664: sems dang sems las byung ba gang yin yang 'gal ba ma mthong ngo //
NK073(pu)004:1665: byang chub kyi sems rdo rje kun tu bzang po'i rang bzhin zhes smos pa ni /
NK073(pu)004:1666: sems kyi rang bzhin byang chub yin pas rdo rje lta bu ste /
NK073(pu)004:1667: de bas na thams cad nas thams cad du spang
NK073(pu)004:1668: zhing dor bar bya ba'i chos med pas kun tu
NK073(pu)004:1669: bzang po'o // de ltar rang gi rgyud kyi gzhung drangs nas /
NK073(pu)004:1670: de dang mthun pa'i lung gzhan dag drangs pa'i phyir /
NK073(pu)004:1671: chos thams cad rang gi sems las gud na med ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
NK073(pu)004:1672: de la dang po khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa las /
NK073(pu)004:1673: rang sems so sor rtog pa ni //
NK073(pu)004:1674: sangs rgyas byang chub de nyid do //
NK073(pu)004:1675: 'jig rten gsum po'ang ni khams gsum gyi sems can /
NK073(pu)004:1677: 'byung ba che rnams te phyi snod kyang de nyid do //
NK073(pu)004:1679: de la rang gi sems so sor rtog pa zhes bya ba ni /
NK073(pu)004:1680: sems kyi rang bzhin phyin ci ma log par rtogs pa la bya ste /
NK073(pu)004:1683: ma 'khrul bar rtogs na byang chub ces bshad pa ni /
NK073(pu)004:1684: rdzogs pa chen po'i gzhung du yang mi 'gyur te /
NK073(pu)004:1685: dam bca' theg pa 'og ma rnams kyang de ltar 'dod pa'i phyir ro 'thad pa /
NK073(pu)004:1686: de bas na rdzogs pa chen po'i rang gzhung ston pa'i skabs /
NK073(pu)004:1687: 'dir chos thams cad sems su snang yang /
NK073(pu)004:1688: snang ba de nyid sangs rgyas byang chub kyi rang bzhin no zhes sbyar ro //
NK073(pu)004:1689: de dang tshul mthun pa gzhan yang /
NK073(pu)004:1691: chos thams cad ni sems la gnas so //
NK073(pu)004:1692: sems ni nam mkha' la gnas so //
NK073(pu)004:1693: nam mkha' ni ci la yang mi gnas so //
NK073(pu)004:1695: de'i don chos thams cad ni sems su 'dus la /
NK073(pu)004:1696: sems kyi rang bzhin ni nam mkha' dang 'dra ste /
NK073(pu)004:1697: nam mkha'i rang bzhin ni mtshan nyid med pa'o zhes ston pa'o //
NK073(pu)004:1698: de dang tshul mthun pa gzhan yang lung thor bu rnams nas 'byung ba /
NK073(pu)004:1699: chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
NK073(pu)004:1700: de la chos thams cad chos can dang chos nyid
NK073(pu)004:1701: rnam par bsgrub pa dang bral bas ngo bo nyid
NK073(pu)004:1703: 'di la 'dis stong zhes rnam par gzhag pa dang bral ba'o //
NK073(pu)004:1704: de bzhin du nyon mongs pa'i dri ma nyid ye
NK073(pu)004:1705: nas grub ma myong bas gzod ma nas rnam par
NK073(pu)004:1706: dag pa'o // sgrib pa'i mun pa nyid ye nas ma grub pas yongs kyis 'od gsal ba'o //
NK073(pu)004:1707: mi mthun pa dang gnyen po gnyis su dbyer med pas /
NK073(pu)004:1708: rang bzhin gyis mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
NK073(pu)004:1709: sgrib pa rnam pa gnyis bri ba dang /
NK073(pu)004:1710: tshogs rnam pa gnyis bsags pa dang bral bas /
NK073(pu)004:1711: ye nas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'o //
NK073(pu)004:1713: rdzogs pa chen po'i don bshad pa'o //
NK073(pu)004:1714: de'i tshul bshad pa'i phyir rdzogs pa chen po'i tshul ni /
NK073(pu)004:1715: rtogs pa rnam bzhi'i lam gyis yid ches te /
NK073(pu)004:1716: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
NK073(pu)004:1717: 'dir rtogs pa rnam pa bzhi ni /
NK073(pu)004:1718: yul gyi tshul te mtshan gzhir gzhag /
NK073(pu)004:1719: mtshan nyid gsum ni thabs kyi tshul te /
NK073(pu)004:1721: bsnyen bsgrub bzhi ni 'bras bu'i tshul te /
NK073(pu)004:1722: la bzla ba'i man ngag tu gzhag /
NK073(pu)004:1723: lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil du 'jug pa'i tshul ni 'jug rim du gzhag go //
NK073(pu)004:1724: de dag la yang rgyu gcig pa dang yig 'bru'i tshul gnyis ni yul gyi tshul /
NK073(pu)004:1725: byin gyis brlabs par rtogs pa ni thabs kyi tshul /
NK073(pu)004:1726: mngon sum par rtogs pa ni 'bras bu'i tshul lo //
NK073(pu)004:1727: de bzhin du mtshan nyid gsum la yang /
NK073(pu)004:1728: shes pa'i mtshan nyid ni yul gyi tshul /
NK073(pu)004:1729: 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid ni thabs kyi tshul /
NK073(pu)004:1730: 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid ni 'bras bu'i tshul lo //
NK073(pu)004:1732: bsnyen pa ni yul gyi tshul /
NK073(pu)004:1734: bsgrub pa ni thabs kyi tshul /
NK073(pu)004:1735: bsgrub pa chen po ni 'bras bu'i tshul lo //
NK073(pu)004:1736: de bzhin du 'jug rim gsum la yang /
NK073(pu)004:1737: thos pas mig phye ba ni yul gyi tshul /
NK073(pu)004:1738: goms par byed pas dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa ni thabs kyi tshul /
NK073(pu)004:1739: goms pas mngon du gyur cing dngos grub chen po thob pa ni 'bras bu'i tshul lo //
NK073(pu)004:1741: yig 'bru'i don cung zad bshad na /
NK073(pu)004:1742: tshogs rnam pa gnyis rdzogs pas na rdzogs pa zhes bya la /
NK073(pu)004:1743: de yang theg pa 'og ma ltar bgrod cing sbyor ba la ltos pa ma yin gyi /
NK073(pu)004:1744: sku gsung thugs 'bras bu'i chos su gdod ma nas lhun gyis grub pa'i chen po /
NK073(pu)004:1745: de lta bu'i don la 'jug pa'i thabs dang sgo ni tshul lo //
NK073(pu)004:1746: rtog pa rnam pa bzhi la /
NK073(pu)004:1747: rgyu gcig par rtogs pa ni rang bzhin gcig par rtogs pa ste /
NK073(pu)004:1748: skye ba grub par byed pa'i rgyu dang gtan tshigs gcig pa lta bu ni ma yin no //
NK073(pu)004:1749: de yang chos thams cad don dam par ma skyes pas so so ma yin pa dang /
NK073(pu)004:1750: kun rdzob sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid du so so yin
NK073(pu)004:1751: pa gnyis ni theg pa chen po'i thun mong ste
NK073(pu)004:1752: / de'i phyir bden pa gnyis kyi skad kyis gzhag go //
NK073(pu)004:1753: de gnyis dbyer med par rtogs pa ni thun mong ma yin pa'o //
NK073(pu)004:1754: yig 'bru'i tshul gyis rtogs pa ste /
NK073(pu)004:1755: gsang sngags 'bras bu'i chos su sangs rgyas par rtogs pa ni /
NK073(pu)004:1756: de yang yig 'bru gsum ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo yin la /
NK073(pu)004:1757: sku gsung thugs 'bras bu'i chos su lhun gyis grub pa ni rnam par thar pa'i don no //
NK073(pu)004:1758: de yang a ni skye ba med pa'i sgo /
NK073(pu)004:1760: ni gnyis su med pa'i sgo /
NK073(pu)004:1761: byin gyis brlabs pa'i rtogs pa ni /
NK073(pu)004:1762: rtogs pa gnyis po'i mthu shes pa'o //
NK073(pu)004:1763: mngon sum par rtogs pa ni /
NK073(pu)004:1764: 'dir shes rab kyi dbang po'i mngon sum ste /
NK073(pu)004:1765: mngon sum gzhan ni ma yin no //
NK073(pu)004:1766: de yang ji ltar bsreg bcad brdar ba gsum gyis gser rtogs par byed pa ni /
NK073(pu)004:1767: bsregs pas ni gser yin nam ma yin shes par byed do //
NK073(pu)004:1768: bcad pas ni zol yod med shes par byed do //
NK073(pu)004:1769: rdo nag po la brdar bas ni gser bzang ngan rtogs par byed do //
NK073(pu)004:1770: de bzhin du rtogs pa'i don gser dang 'dra bar gtan la dbab par bya ba de yang /
NK073(pu)004:1771: lung dang ma 'gal na ni spyi la 'khrul pa med de /
NK073(pu)004:1772: bsregs pas gser brtag pa dang chos mtshungs so //
NK073(pu)004:1773: lung la yang sgra ji bzhin ma yin par bshad cing /
NK073(pu)004:1774: dgongs pa'i tshig don gzhung du 'dren pa dang /
NK073(pu)004:1775: don rtogs par dka' ba yang yod pas /
NK073(pu)004:1776: bla ma rnams kyi man ngag dang ma 'gal na skyon de lta bu yang sel bas /
NK073(pu)004:1777: bcad pas gser brtag pa dang chos mtshungs pa yin no //
NK073(pu)004:1778: de ltar lung dang man ngag dang mi 'gal yang /
NK073(pu)004:1779: tshig tsam gyis sgra phyir 'brangs te /
NK073(pu)004:1780: rang gi blo'i gting du nyams su ma lon pa yang yod pas /
NK073(pu)004:1781: lung dang man ngag gi tshig tsam la ma brten par /
NK073(pu)004:1782: blo'i gting du yid ches shing mngon sum du rtogs pas ni /
NK073(pu)004:1783: nyes skyon de yang sel te /
NK073(pu)004:1784: brdar bas gser brtag pa dang chos mtshungs so //
NK073(pu)004:1785: mngon sum de yang so sor rtog pa'i shes rab kyi dus na yin te /
NK073(pu)004:1786: rnal 'byor gyi mthus mngon du gyur pa'i dus na ni 'bras bu nyid yin no //
NK073(pu)004:1787: de la mtshan nyid gsum gyis don mthar phyin par gyur pa ni /
NK073(pu)004:1788: rtogs pa rnam pa bzhi mtshan gzhir bzhag pa de la /
NK073(pu)004:1789: shes pa dang 'jug pa dang mngon du gyur pa'i tshul gyis mtshan nyid gsum du 'gyur la /
NK073(pu)004:1790: des rdzogs pa chen po'i don mthar phyin par 'gyur bas /
NK073(pu)004:1791: 'di dang mi ldan du mi rung ngo zhes shes par bya'o //
NK073(pu)004:1792: mtshan nyid gsum gyis dgos 'brel gsum bstan pa ni /
NK073(pu)004:1795: rtogs pa rnam bzhi'i tshul rig pa ni shes pa'i mtshan nyid de /
NK073(pu)004:1798: bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas su 'grub pa'i rgyu yin pa'i don dang 'brel ba'o zhes sbyar ro //
NK073(pu)004:1799: rtogs pa rnam bzhi'i tshul ji ltar rig zhe na /
NK073(pu)004:1800: kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /
NK073(pu)004:1801: rnam par byang ba'i chos su btags pa thams cad /
NK073(pu)004:1802: yig 'bru'i tshul gyis rtogs pa'i don gyis /
NK073(pu)004:1803: ye nas sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid /
NK073(pu)004:1804: rgyu gcig par rtogs pa'i don gyis rang bzhin gyis sangs rgyas pa'i dbyings dang /
NK073(pu)004:1805: byin gyis brlabs par rtogs pa dang mngon sum par
NK073(pu)004:1806: rtogs pa'i don gyis byin gyi rlabs yin par don
NK073(pu)004:1807: rtogs pa ste / de ni shes pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
NK073(pu)004:1808: dgos pa ni 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid de /
NK073(pu)004:1809: gang gi phyir dgos zhe na /
NK073(pu)004:1810: bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas su 'grub pa'i rgyu rkyen yin pa'i phyir dgos pa'o //
NK073(pu)004:1811: dgos pa'i yang dgos pa ni 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid de /
NK073(pu)004:1813: chos thams cad ye nas mnyam pa chen po'i ngang
NK073(pu)004:1814: du blang dor med par lhun gyis grub pa ni
NK073(pu)004:1816: de yang gang gi phyir zhe na /
NK073(pu)004:1817: srid pa'i 'khor ba nyid ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i rang bzhin /
NK073(pu)004:1818: mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtshan nyid lhun gyis grub pa yin pa'i phyir te /
NK073(pu)004:1819: dngos su na sku gsung thugs mi zad rgyan gyi
NK073(pu)004:1820: 'khor lo mngon sum du gyur pa ni dgos pa'i
NK073(pu)004:1821: yang dgos pa'o // zhes sbyar ro //
NK073(pu)004:1822: de la 'di skad du rgyu rkyen 'bras bu dang gsum ni /
NK073(pu)004:1823: theg pa 'og ma'i gzhung dang mthun pa yin na /
NK073(pu)004:1824: rdzogs pa chen po ye nas sangs rgyas pa la /
NK073(pu)004:1825: rgyu rkyen 'bras bur bzhag pa mi 'gal lam zhe na /
NK073(pu)004:1826: de la 'di ltar ma h+aa yo ga la sogs pa theg pa 'og ma'i gzhung gis /
NK073(pu)004:1827: lam gyi dngos po bsnyen bsgrub kyi yan lag gi rgyu rkyen /
NK073(pu)004:1829: 'bras bu grub par bya ba 'dod pa yin la /
NK073(pu)004:1830: rdzogs pa chen po'i gnas skabs na /
NK073(pu)004:1831: de yang de ltar bya mi dgos te /
NK073(pu)004:1832: bsnyen bsgrub rnam pa bzhi yang /
NK073(pu)004:1833: dngos rtsol ba med par lhun gyis grub pa'i rnal 'byor la rdzogs pas /
NK073(pu)004:1834: rgyu rkyen 'bras bu'i dngos por dngos su gyur pa ni med de zhes don lhun gyis grub par /
NK073(pu)004:1835: la bzla ba'i man ngag tu sbyar ro //
NK073(pu)004:1836: de la ma h+aa yo ga'i bsnyen bsgrub bzhi las /
NK073(pu)004:1837: rdzogs pa chen po la bzla ba ni cung zad
NK073(pu)004:1838: gsal lo ste bsnyen pa byang chub kyi sems zhes
NK073(pu)004:1839: 'dod pa la sogs pa'am da lam gyis ma yin
NK073(pu)004:1841: bsgrub pa chen po thabs dang shes rab zung du 'brel ba /
NK073(pu)004:1842: byang chub kyi sems dang bcas pa 'brel bar ston pa la /
NK073(pu)004:1843: thabs dang shes rab byang chub sems dang gsum /
NK073(pu)004:1844: yab yum sprul pa lcam dral dang gsum /
NK073(pu)004:1845: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
NK073(pu)004:1847: mtshan ma med pa dang gsum ye nas bzung du 'brel cing /
NK073(pu)004:1848: lhun gyis grub bo zhes sbyar ro //
NK073(pu)004:1849: bdud rnam pa bzhi btul ba ni /
NK073(pu)004:1850: spyir gzhung so so las bdud btul ba'i thabs so sor grags pa yod de /
NK073(pu)004:1851: de las 'dir ni bsnyen bsgrub yan lag bzhi'i sgo nas /
NK073(pu)004:1852: bdud rnam bzhi btul bar 'dod de /
NK073(pu)004:1853: de yang 'di ltar bsnyen pa byang chub kyi sems shes pa'i mtshan nyid /
NK073(pu)004:1854: ma skyes pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis 'chi bdag gi bdud bcom mo //
NK073(pu)004:1855: nye ba'i bsnyen pa bdag nyid lhar shes pa'i mtshan nyid /
NK073(pu)004:1856: sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis phung po'i bdud bcom mo //
NK073(pu)004:1857: bsgrub pa yum bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid /
NK073(pu)004:1858: rdul dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis nyon mongs pa'i bdud bcom pa'o //
NK073(pu)004:1859: bsgrub pa chen po thabs dang shes rab zung du 'brel ba'i mtshan nyid /
NK073(pu)004:1860: mi dmigs mkha' dang snyoms pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis lha'i bu'i bar chad g.yeng ba'i bdud bcom mo //
NK073(pu)004:1861: de ltar na gang la bdud rnam pa bzhi 'dul bar byed pa'i mthu yod pa'i lam de ni /
NK073(pu)004:1862: rnam par dag pa'i lam yin la /
NK073(pu)004:1863: de yang rtsol ba med par lhun gyis grub pa'i lam chen po'o //
NK073(pu)004:1864: da ni rdzogs pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug rim bstan te /
NK073(pu)004:1865: de yang theg pa 'og ma'i gnas skabs nas /
NK073(pu)004:1866: rdul tshon la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i rim pa'ang /
NK073(pu)004:1867: mig phye ba dang dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid kyi don bstan pa dang /
NK073(pu)004:1869: dngos grub bsgrub pa la 'jug par byed pa yin te /
NK073(pu)004:1870: 'dir ni de lta bu la ltos pa'ang ma yin te /
NK073(pu)004:1871: dkyil 'khor ni chos thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas
NK073(pu)004:1872: pa'i bla na med pa'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug go
NK073(pu)004:1873: // 'jug thabs ni gsang ba rnam pa gsum gyi sgo nas 'jug ste /
NK073(pu)004:1874: de yang theg pa chen po ma nor bar ston pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen las /
NK073(pu)004:1875: dang po nyan pa'i shes rab kyis gzhung thos pa ni mig phye ba'o //
NK073(pu)004:1876: de nas bsam pa'i shes rab kyis don rtogs pa
NK073(pu)004:1877: ni dkyil 'khor mthong ba ste lha'i mtshan nyid ngo
NK073(pu)004:1878: shes pa'o // rtogs nas bsgom pa'i shes rab kyis goms par byed pa ni /
NK073(pu)004:1879: dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa ste dbang bskur ba thob pa'o //
NK073(pu)004:1880: zhugs na mngon du gyur pa ni dngos grub chen po thob pa ste /
NK073(pu)004:1881: de ltar yang gzhung 'di nyid las /
NK073(pu)004:1882: ye shes rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la //
NK073(pu)004:1883: thos bsam bsgom pa'i mnyam sbyor gyis //
NK073(pu)004:1884: rang byung kun ngam lhun gyis grub //
NK073(pu)004:1885: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
NK073(pu)004:1886: 'da' bar mi mdzad dam tshig mchog /
NK073(pu)004:1887: ces gsungs pa'i don yin par dgongs so //
NK073(pu)004:1888: da ni rdzogs pa chen po'i tshul 'di kun gyi thun mong ma yin par ston te /
NK073(pu)004:1890: de ltar tshul 'di ni rdzogs pa chen po mthar phyin pa'i don /
NK073(pu)004:1891: yi ge 'khor lo tshogs chen gyi sa la lhun gyis 'jug pa ste /
NK073(pu)004:1892: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
NK073(pu)004:1893: de la yi ge 'khor lo tshogs chen gyi sa zhes bya ba ni /
NK073(pu)004:1894: spyir gzhung so so las sangs rgyas kyi sa'i bye brag so sor grags pa'ang /
NK073(pu)004:1895: mtshan nyid kyi theg pa spyi las sangs rgyas kyi sa kun tu 'od ces grags te /
NK073(pu)004:1896: 'di lha las 'od zer mang po bkye bas gdul
NK073(pu)004:1897: bya'i 'gro ba snod du rung bar mdzad pa'i phyir
NK073(pu)004:1900: rdo rje theg pa spyi las ni /
NK073(pu)004:1901: sangs rgyas kyi sa gsum du grags te /
NK073(pu)004:1902: 'di ltar kun tu 'od kyi sa dang /
NK073(pu)004:1904: yi ge 'khor lo tshogs chen gyi sa ste /
NK073(pu)004:1906: chos kyi sku mtshan ma med pa rang bzhin gyi sa 'od gsal bas kun la khyab pa'o //
NK073(pu)004:1907: pad+ma can ni dmigs pa med pa'i shes rab kyis /
NK073(pu)004:1908: chos kyi sku'i don cir yang ma gzigs pa nyid /
NK073(pu)004:1909: ma chags pa'i thugs rje'i gzhi yin pa'o //
NK073(pu)004:1910: yi ge 'khor lo tshogs chen ni /
NK073(pu)004:1911: de nyid kyi dus na ye shes dang mtshan ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi bdag nyid /
NK073(pu)004:1912: rtsol ba med par lhun gyis grub pa ste /
NK073(pu)004:1913: de la yi ge ni gnyis te /
NK073(pu)004:1915: mtshan ma la'ang rnam pa gnyis te /
NK073(pu)004:1917: gzugs kyang rnam pa gnyis te /
NK073(pu)004:1918: yongs su rdzogs pa dang cha shas su snang ba /
NK073(pu)004:1919: 'di lta bu'i 'bras bu'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs chen por lhun gyis grub pa ni /
NK073(pu)004:1920: yi ge 'khor lo tshogs chen gyi sa zhes kyang bya /
NK073(pu)004:1921: sangs rgyas kyi sa bcu gsum pa zhes kyang bya'o //
NK073(pu)004:1922: rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las /
NK073(pu)004:1923: sangs rgyas kyi sa bcu gnyis gsungs te /
NK073(pu)004:1924: de yang thabs dang shes rab gnyis /
NK073(pu)004:1925: sku lnga ye shes lnga ste bcu gnyis la bzhag par snang ngo //
NK073(pu)004:1926: 'di lta bu la ni gzhung 'di nyid las /
NK073(pu)004:1927: sa rab rig pa 'dzin la gnas //
NK073(pu)004:1929: thabs dang shes rab mchog gis /
NK073(pu)004:1931: gzhan las kyang rdo rje 'dzin gyi sa zhe'am /
NK073(pu)004:1932: kun tu bzang po dbye ba med pa'i sa zhe'am /
NK073(pu)004:1933: ye shes bla ma'i sa zhes bya ba la sogs
NK073(pu)004:1934: pa thams cad kyang don 'di lta bu la bya
NK073(pu)004:1935: ste / che ba'i yon tan gyi sgo so so gtsor bzhag pa tsam du zad do //
NK073(pu)004:1936: 'di ltar bu la ma btsal lhun gyis 'jug pa 'di yang /
NK073(pu)004:1937: skyes bu blo rtsal rab kyis goms pa drag rdul du 'gro ba yin gyi /
NK073(pu)004:1938: phal gyis bya ba ni ma yin no zhes thun mong ma yin par bstan pa ste /
NK073(pu)004:1939: de la goms pa drag rdul du 'gro zhes bya ba ni /
NK073(pu)004:1940: cig car 'gro ba ste rim gyis 'gro ba bkag pa'o //
NK073(pu)004:1941: sngon gyi slob dpon la dag gi man ngag las /
NK073(pu)004:1943: blo'i rtsal chung ba rim gyis 'gro ba yin no zhes zer ba ni /
NK073(pu)004:1944: don gyi skabs ma yin pa dang tshig gi shugs dang 'gal ba'i phyir gzhag go //
NK073(pu)004:1945: de ltar na kun gyi thun mong ma yin pas /
NK073(pu)004:1946: slob dpon gyi sa 'dzin pa rnams kyis kyang /
NK073(pu)004:1947: theg pa thams cad la mkhas par byas la /
NK073(pu)004:1948: gdul bya'i snod dang sbyar te bstan dgos so zhes gsungs pa ste /
NK073(pu)004:1950: snod ma yin pa la byin pa'i skyon bstan par 'byung la /
NK073(pu)004:1951: dbang bskur ba'i tan+t+ra la sogs pa bka' phal mo che las kyang grags pas /
NK073(pu)004:1952: gsang ba 'di yang rang bzo ma yin par dgongs pa'o //
NK073(pu)004:1953: da ni gong du bstan pa'i lta ba'i khyad par de dag gi spyod pa dang grogs kyi mtshan /
NK073(pu)004:1954: sdom pa'i ngo bo dka' thub dang brtul zhugs kyi bye brag bstan par zhed nas /
NK073(pu)004:1955: lta ba'i khyad par gyis dka' thub dang brtul zhugs kyang bye brag tu 'gyur te /
NK073(pu)004:1956: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
NK073(pu)004:1957: de la lta ba mig dang 'dra bas ji ltar bcad pa bzhin du /
NK073(pu)004:1958: dka' thub dang brtul zhugs rkang pa dang 'dra ba
NK073(pu)004:1959: rjes su 'gro ba 'gyur ro zhes pa'i don te
NK073(pu)004:1960: / de la dka' thub ni tha pa sa zhes bya ba gdung ba'i don te /
NK073(pu)004:1961: yon tan gyi 'bras bu 'dod pa'i phyir lus gdung bar byed pa'i spyod pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'o //
NK073(pu)004:1963: bar+tha zhes bya ba bsgyur ba'i don te /
NK073(pu)004:1964: yon tan gyi 'bras bu 'dod pa'i phyir /
NK073(pu)004:1965: rang gi ngang tshul snga ma'i gnas las gzhan du bsgyur ba'i spyod pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'o //
NK073(pu)004:1966: de la lta ba'i bye brag gis dka' thub yod med gnyis su 'gyur te /
NK073(pu)004:1967: de la dka' thub med pa ni /
NK073(pu)004:1968: lta ba la bsgrub par bya ba med pa'i dbang gis /
NK073(pu)004:1972: lta ba la bsgrub par bya ba yod pa'i dbang gis rnam pa bzhi'o //
NK073(pu)004:1973: de la rang sangs rgyas lta ba'i skabs su gud du bzhag nas /
NK073(pu)004:1974: dka' thub ma smos pa ni nyan thos dang mthun par sbyar /
NK073(pu)004:1975: me lnga bsten pa'i dka' thub ces bya ba ni /
NK073(pu)004:1976: 'jig rten gyi mngon par shes pa thob pa'i bye brag gang gis /
NK073(pu)004:1977: 'gro ba gang dag lhar skyes pa'i las nye bar gnas pa las /
NK073(pu)004:1978: grang ba'i rkyen gyis phyogs bzhir me bzhi bstan pa mthong ste /
NK073(pu)004:1979: des las kyi rkyen ni ma mthong /
NK073(pu)004:1980: spyod pa'i tshul las 'di la yon tan ci zhig yod snyam du bsams te /
NK073(pu)004:1981: 'jig rten gyi mngon shes kyis brtags na /
NK073(pu)004:1982: shi 'phos nas lhar skye ba mthong bas /
NK073(pu)004:1983: mes gdungs pa'i yon tan du mthong ste /
NK073(pu)004:1984: de nas shin tu nyi ma tsha ba nyid la /
NK073(pu)004:1985: mes gdungs pa yon tan du lta ste /
NK073(pu)004:1986: me bzhi nyi ma dang lnga bsten pas me lnga bsten pa'i dka' thub 'jig rten du 'byung ngo //
NK073(pu)004:1987: de bas na 'di yang lta bas rnal 'byor gyi mngon sum gyis grub pa dang /
NK073(pu)004:1988: des mi dmigs pa tshad mar byas te /
NK073(pu)004:1989: yongs su bcad pa'i rjes su 'brangs ba yin te /
NK073(pu)004:1990: gzhan la yang de bzhin du sbyar ro //
NK073(pu)004:1991: brtul zhugs log par spyod pa zhes pa ni /
NK073(pu)004:1992: lus sdug bsngal bar byed pa'i mtshan nyid ni /
NK073(pu)004:1993: sangs rgyas pa'i dka' thub la yang yod de /
NK073(pu)004:1995: lus kyi nyon mongs spyad pa las //
NK073(pu)004:1998: de bas na de lta bu rnam par bcad pa'i phyir de skad ces smos te /
NK073(pu)004:1999: ngal ba 'bras bu med pa'i las can no zhes bya ba'i tshig go //
NK073(pu)004:2000: nyan thos kyi dka' thub ni /
NK073(pu)004:2001: so sor thar pa'i mdo las /
NK073(pu)004:2002: sdig pa thams cad mi bya ste //
NK073(pu)004:2003: dge ba phun sum tshogs pa spyad //
NK073(pu)004:2004: rang gi sems ni yongs su 'dul //
NK073(pu)004:2005: 'di ni sangs rgyas bstan pa yin //
NK073(pu)004:2007: bslab pa gsum mdor bsdus nas sangs rgyas kyi bkar bzhag pa ste /
NK073(pu)004:2009: sdig pa thams cad mi bya ste //
NK073(pu)004:2011: tshul khrims kyi bslab pa'i dbang du gsungs pa ste /
NK073(pu)004:2012: 'di ltar mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam las kyang /
NK073(pu)004:2013: shin tu lci bar gyur pa /
NK073(pu)004:2015: ma byin par len pa dang /
NK073(pu)004:2016: mi tshangs par spyod pa dang /
NK073(pu)004:2018: pham par 'gyur ba'i lus ngag gi gnas ngan len gyi las rnams dang /
NK073(pu)004:2019: de la sogs par bya ba ma yin pa las ldog pa'i tshul khrims kyi bslab pa rnams so //
NK073(pu)004:2020: dge ba phun sum tshogs par spyad //
NK073(pu)004:2022: shes rab kyi bslab pa'i dbang du gsungs pa ste /
NK073(pu)004:2023: bden pa bzhi'i don phyin ci ma log par rtogs pa'i shes rab kyis bsdus pa /
NK073(pu)004:2024: 'phags pa'i lam dang 'bras bu'i chos spyad cig thob par bya ba'i chos rnams so //
NK073(pu)004:2025: rang gi sems ni yongs su 'dul //
NK073(pu)004:2027: lhag pa'i sems kyi bslab pa'i dbang du gsungs pa ste /
NK073(pu)004:2028: 'di ltar 'gro ba la phal pa rnams ni 'dod
NK073(pu)004:2029: pa'i yon tan lnga la rang bzhin gyis sems 'phro
NK073(pu)004:2030: bas / nyon mongs pa thams cad skye ba'i spyod yul la ngang gis bsten pa can yin la /
NK073(pu)004:2031: 'phags pa rnams ni bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin
NK073(pu)004:2032: dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i mthus sems dbang du gyur
NK073(pu)004:2033: pas / ma dag pa'i spyod yul las phyir ldog ste /
NK073(pu)004:2034: rnam par dag pa'i spyod yul la 'jug par byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin bstan pa yin no //
NK073(pu)004:2035: 'di ni sangs rgyas bstan pa yin //
NK073(pu)004:2037: tshad mar byed pa'i tshig ste /
NK073(pu)004:2038: 'di lta bu'ang 'jig rten gyi dbang phyug chen po
NK073(pu)004:2039: la sogs pas bshad pa'i lung dang mi 'dra ste
NK073(pu)004:2040: / kun gyis yid brtul du rung ba'i tshad ma
NK073(pu)004:2041: sangs rgyas nyid kyis bstan pa dam pa'i chos 'dul
NK073(pu)004:2042: ba legs par gsungs pa yin no //
NK073(pu)004:2043: de'i dbang gis dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos thams cad /
NK073(pu)004:2044: kun rdzob dang don dam pa gnyis kar so sor lta'o zhes sbyar te /
NK073(pu)004:2045: de la yod pa zhes bya ba ni rig pas rnam par bzhag pa yin te /
NK073(pu)004:2046: de'i phyir kun rdzob tu yang yod la don dam par yang yod ces gzhag ste /
NK073(pu)004:2047: 'di ltar kun rdzob kyi shes pa la snang ba'i chos gang dag /
NK073(pu)004:2048: don dam pa'i shes pa la'ang snang ste /
NK073(pu)004:2049: de bas na gnyis kar yod pa zhes bya'o //
NK073(pu)004:2050: bden pa zhes ma smos pa ni /
NK073(pu)004:2051: sgrib pas bzhag pa yin pa'i phyir /
NK073(pu)004:2052: gnyis ka bden du mi rung ste /
NK073(pu)004:2053: 'di ltar gang kun rdzob kyi bden pa yin par grub pa de ni /
NK073(pu)004:2054: don dam pa'i bden pa yin par 'gal la /
NK073(pu)004:2055: de las ldog pa'ang de bzhin te /
NK073(pu)004:2056: de bas na 'dir bden par sgrub pa ma yin gyi /
NK073(pu)004:2057: yod par sgrub pa yin pas /
NK073(pu)004:2058: de bas na 'di kun rdzob dang don dam pa
NK073(pu)004:2059: gnyis kar so sor yod par lta ba zhes rnam
NK073(pu)004:2061: de'i dbang gi lus ngag gi dge mi dge dag kyang blang dor du spyod do //
NK073(pu)004:2062: byang chub sems dpa'i dka' thub ni /
NK073(pu)004:2064: sdom pa nyi shu pa las /
NK073(pu)004:2065: rkyen du 'tshams par don mi byed //
NK073(pu)004:2066: rdzu 'phrul bsdigs la sogs mi byed //
NK073(pu)004:2067: snying rjer ldan zhing byams phyir dang //
NK073(pu)004:2068: sems dge ba la nyes pa med //
NK073(pu)004:2070: sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las bsgral ba'i phyir /
NK073(pu)004:2071: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sems bskyed pa ni /
NK073(pu)004:2073: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes de ma thob par
NK073(pu)004:2074: sems can gyi don byed kyang mi nus pas so
NK073(pu)004:2075: // des thob par bya na rgyu ni snying rjes bsdus pa'i byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa'o //
NK073(pu)004:2076: rtsa ba ni snying rje chen po'o //
NK073(pu)004:2077: mthar 'byin pa ni thabs la mkhas pa ste /
NK073(pu)004:2078: 'di gsum ni mi tshang du mi rung ngo //
NK073(pu)004:2079: de'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs su gyur pa /
NK073(pu)004:2080: rang bzhin gyis kha na ma tho bar gyur pa //
NK073(pu)004:2081: byang chub sems dpa'i pham pa ni rnam pa bzhi yin te /
NK073(pu)004:2082: de la byang chub kyi sems yongs su gzung ba'i mi mthun pa ni /
NK073(pu)004:2083: byang chub kyi sems gtong ngo //
NK073(pu)004:2084: de'i rtsa ba snying rje chen po'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs ni /
NK073(pu)004:2085: ser sna'i dbang gis sems can mi skyob pa dang /
NK073(pu)004:2086: gnod sems kyis sems can la gnod pa byed pa'o //
NK073(pu)004:2087: de mthar phyin par byed pa'i thabs la mkhas pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs ni /
NK073(pu)004:2088: dam pa'i chos yongs su spang ba yin te /
NK073(pu)004:2089: de ltar dam pa'i chos yongs su spang ba dang /
NK073(pu)004:2090: byang chub kyi sems gtong ba dang /
NK073(pu)004:2092: sems can la gnod pa byed pa rnam pa bzhi'i pham pa ma byung zhing /
NK073(pu)004:2093: rtsa ba snying rje cha zin nas /
NK073(pu)004:2094: lus ngag gi spyod tshul sems can tshar bcad pa
NK073(pu)004:2095: dag kyang ched du bya dgos te de bas na
NK073(pu)004:2096: / rkyen du 'tshams par tshar mi gcod //
NK073(pu)004:2098: byang chub sems dpa' dag tshar gcod pa'i las kyis 'gro ba 'dul ba'i rkyen du 'tshams bzhin du /
NK073(pu)004:2099: tshar gcod par mi byed na yang nyams par 'gyur ro //
NK073(pu)004:2101: rdzu 'phrul bsdigs la sogs mi byed //
NK073(pu)004:2103: rdzu 'phrul bstan pas brid pa dang skye ba dang
NK073(pu)004:2104: bsdigs pa la sogs pa sbyor ba dam pa ma
NK073(pu)004:2105: yin pa rnams kyis 'dul bzhin du de ltar mi
NK073(pu)004:2106: ston na yang nyams par 'gyur ba ste /
NK073(pu)004:2107: de dag ni bzlog ste bstan pa'o //
NK073(pu)004:2108: snying rjer ldan zhing byams phyir dang //
NK073(pu)004:2109: sems dge ba la nyes pa med //
NK073(pu)004:2112: 'di ltar bsam pa byams pa dang snying rjes zin te /
NK073(pu)004:2113: sems dge na sbyor ba rtsub kyang sdom pa nyams pa'i nyes pa med ces sbyar ro //
NK073(pu)004:2114: gsang ba bla na med pa'i dka' thub ni /
NK073(pu)004:2115: dam tshig chen po'i mdo nyid las /
NK073(pu)004:2116: sangs rgyas theg par rab nges na //
NK073(pu)004:2117: nyon mongs 'dod lnga kun spyad kyang //
NK073(pu)004:2119: de la tshul khrims phun sum tshogs //
NK073(pu)004:2122: sangs rgyas theg par rab nges na //
NK073(pu)004:2124: thabs dang shes rab zab mo'i tshul gding du gyur pa'i blo yod pa ste /
NK073(pu)004:2125: bsam pa mnyam pa gding du gyur na zhes bya ba'i don to //
NK073(pu)004:2128: pad+ma la 'dam gyis mi gos pa bzhin no zhes bya ba ni /
NK073(pu)004:2129: byas la mi sogs par bstan pa'i tshig ste /
NK073(pu)004:2130: ji ltar so sor thar pa'i sdom pa las /
NK073(pu)004:2131: gzhan gyi don du bsam pa'i las ni /
NK073(pu)004:2132: pham pa las sbom por 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa dang /
NK073(pu)004:2133: byang chub sems dpa'i mdo las /
NK073(pu)004:2134: bsam pa snying rjes zin pa'i sbyor ba rtsub mo rnams ni nyes byas med par ma zad kyi /
NK073(pu)004:2135: sdom pa phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro zhes 'dod pa bzhin du /
NK073(pu)004:2136: 'dir bsam pa mnyam pas zin na /
NK073(pu)004:2137: las ji ltar spyad kyang skyon gyis gos par mi 'gyur te /
NK073(pu)004:2138: gzhan du na nyan thos kyi tshul khrims dang /
NK073(pu)004:2139: byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa thams cad kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro //
NK073(pu)004:2141: chos mnyam pa nyid kyi blos zin na ci yang mi 'gal lo zhes dgongs pa'o //
NK073(pu)004:2142: mdor bsdu na nyan thos kyi sdom pa ni /
NK073(pu)004:2143: sems can la gnod pa'i sbyor ba las logs pa'o //
NK073(pu)004:2144: byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa ni /
NK073(pu)004:2145: sems can la gnod par spyod pa las log gi steng du yang /
NK073(pu)004:2146: sems can la phan 'dogs pa la zhugs pa'o //
NK073(pu)004:2147: gsang sngags kyi sdom pa ni /
NK073(pu)004:2148: sems can la gnod par sbyor ba las log cing phan 'dogs par zhugs pa de yang /
NK073(pu)004:2149: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad spyod nyams su blangs te spyod pa'o //
NK073(pu)004:2150: gzhan yang nyan thos kyi sdom pa ni /
NK073(pu)004:2151: 'du shes dang dngos gzhi'i sgo nas gtso bo yin par 'dod do //
NK073(pu)004:2152: byang chub sems dpa' ni snying rje gtso bo yin par 'dod do //
NK073(pu)004:2153: gsang sngags kyi ni shes rab gtso bo yin par 'dod do //
NK073(pu)004:2154: gzhan yang nyan thos kyi ni /
NK073(pu)004:2155: sngon gyi 'phags pa dgra bcom pa rnams kyi rjes su slob pa'o //
NK073(pu)004:2157: sa chen po la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rjes su slob pa'o //
NK073(pu)004:2158: gsang sngags kyi ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi rjes su slob pa'o //
NK073(pu)004:2159: ha cang spros pas chog go //
NK073(pu)004:2160: gzhung nyid la 'jug par bya ste /
NK073(pu)004:2161: gsang sngags mnyam pa chen po'i dam tshig la spyod
NK073(pu)004:2162: pa thams cad kyi thams cad du rnam par ma
NK073(pu)004:2164: de bas na ji ltar lta bas ye nas rnam par dag par rtogs pa bzhin du /
NK073(pu)004:2165: dka' thub dang brtul zhugs kyang de ltar rnam par
NK073(pu)004:2166: dag par spyod pa'o zhes gsang sngags mnyam pa chen
NK073(pu)004:2167: po'i dam tshig gi slad sdud pa'i tshig tu sbyar
NK073(pu)004:2169: lta ba ma dag pa rnams kyi dka' thub dang
NK073(pu)004:2170: brtul zhugs kyang rim gyis ma dag par spyod do
NK073(pu)004:2171: zhes bya ba / ma smos kyang don gyis rtogs par shes par bya'o //
NK073(pu)004:2172: de ltar gzhung gi don bstan pa rdzogs nas /
NK073(pu)004:2173: las su brtsams pa don yod par bya ba'i phyir /
NK073(pu)004:2174: dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo ba mdzad pa ni /
NK073(pu)004:2175: lta ba'i phreng ba gsang ba 'di //
NK073(pu)004:2176: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
NK073(pu)004:2177: de la lta ba mtho dman gyi bye brag rnams
NK073(pu)004:2178: phreng ba bzhin du rim pas rgyud chags su bkod
NK073(pu)004:2179: cing / dgos pa tshang bar bsdus pas na /
NK073(pu)004:2180: lta ba'i phreng ba zhes bya'o //
NK073(pu)004:2181: gsang ba zhes bya ba ni man ngag gi don te /
NK073(pu)004:2182: theg pa mtha' dag gi don tshig nyung ngur bsdus
NK073(pu)004:2183: nas blo la bcang ba'i man ngag tu gzhag pa
NK073(pu)004:2184: yin pa dang / tshig nyung ngu 'dis don mang
NK073(pu)004:2185: po rtogs par byed pa'i sgo nas sgron ma yin
NK073(pu)004:2186: yin pa dang / pas / yid bzhin gyi nor
NK073(pu)004:2187: bu rin po che bzhin du gces spras byas nas
NK073(pu)004:2188: gsang zhing sbas te bcang bar bya ba yin pas
NK073(pu)004:2190: rnam pa gcig tu rdzogs pa chen po'i don ni /
NK073(pu)004:2191: kun gyi thun mong ma yin pas /
NK073(pu)004:2192: thugs rje chen po'i thabs kyis kyang gsang bar bya ba yin pas na /
NK073(pu)004:2194: dmus long rang phye mig rnyed ltar //
NK073(pu)004:2195: shes rab thabs kyi rtsal 'chang ba'i //
NK073(pu)004:2196: skye mchog yod na 'phrad gyur cig /
NK073(pu)004:2198: ji ltar dmus long gzugs kyi bye brag mthong ma
NK073(pu)004:2199: myong ba dag nam zhig na sngon gyi bsod nams
NK073(pu)004:2200: kyi las kyis mig rang phye ba srid de /
NK073(pu)004:2201: de bzhin du 'gro ba rnams thog ma med pa
NK073(pu)004:2202: nas ling thog gis shes rab kyi mig ldongs te
NK073(pu)004:2203: / phyin ci ma log pa'i don mthong ma myong ba las /
NK073(pu)004:2204: sngon gyi bsod nams kyi las kyis skye bas thob pa'i shes rab dang /
NK073(pu)004:2205: thabs kyi rtsal mchog dang ldan pa'i skyes mchog dag yod na 'di dang 'phrad par gyur cig ce'o //
NK073(pu)004:2206: rnam pa gcig tu dmus long dag gis /
NK073(pu)004:2207: phyag dar gyi phung po la nom pa las /
NK073(pu)004:2208: bsod nams kyi las kyis nor bu rin po che zhig dang 'phrad de /
NK073(pu)004:2209: de'i dbang gi mig rang phye nas /
NK073(pu)004:2210: 'byor pa sna tshogs dang yang ldan pa bzhin du /
NK073(pu)004:2211: gang dag gis 'khor ba'i phyag dar gyi phung po las /
NK073(pu)004:2212: rkyen dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang 'phrad de /
NK073(pu)004:2213: de'i dbang gi shes rab rnam pa gsum gyi mig phye nas /
NK073(pu)004:2214: thabs dang shes rab kyi rtsal rnyed pa'i skyes mchog dag yod na /
NK073(pu)004:2215: de dag gi don du rung ba'i man ngag 'di dang 'phrad par gyur cig ce'o //
NK073(pu)004:2216: man ngag gi yi ge 'di ni /
NK073(pu)004:2217: slob dpon pad+ma 'byung gnas bod yul nas slar gshegs kar /
NK073(pu)004:2218: brag dmar mtsho mo mgur gyi ne'u thang du mgur gsum bzhed pa nas /
NK073(pu)004:2219: lha sras khri srong lde btsan dang rje 'bangs dgyes phyag gi dus su /
NK073(pu)004:2220: 'di dang ma mo gsang ba las kyi thig le gnyis mdzad nas /
NK073(pu)004:2221: lha sras la man ngag tu gnas ste bzhag pa lags so //
NK073(pu)004:2222: man ngag lta phreng gi 'grel pa 'di rong zom
NK073(pu)004:2223: pan+di ta chen po chos kyi bzang po zhes bya
NK073(pu)004:2224: ba rgya bod gnyis na mkhas pa'i khyu mchog chen
NK073(pu)004:2225: por gyur pa des mdzad pa'o //
